about_the_game:
BATTLE RECORDS OF ROTA is a straightforward action shooting RPG game, mainly for players who like anime and action shooting games. Players will play Luota, a girl warrior, to help the little prince defeat the witch and regain the throne. In the game, there are various enemies such as monsters, orcs, humans, vampires, and enchanters. The plot is rich and challenging.

In the game, players will switch between the two main characters to defeat powerful enemies

Female protagonist: In melee, using a spear, she can bounce back against enemy attacks and cause huge damage. She can release powerful gun skills through skill items

Male protagonist: Main remote control, using various types of firearms, releasing various types of barrage attacks such as direct fire, shotgun, explosive, tracking, etc
